review: I took an appointment for 5pm. when I went there I was told doc is only coming at 6:30pm and that too a different doc. on asking why they accepted the appointment timing, I was told that they were going to call me at 5 pm to tell me about the change. so it was a misuse  of time, energy and when you are sick, it bites even more as one tired and low on energy. practo should also coordinate better on these fronts.
